subject: Baseball
Coaches and Managers
Minorities
Blacks
Hispanic-Americans
Race and Ethnicity
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Rob Manfred said of the dearth of black and Latino managers: “You’re going to have peaks and valleys within what is a very small sample.”
snippet: Commissioner Rob Manfred said of the dearth of black and Latino managers: “You’re going to have peaks and valleys within what is a very small sample.”
